scripts.preinstall:
:; echo 'module.exports.push(100);' >> log.js; exit $?
echo module.exports.push(100); >> log.js
scripts.install:
:; echo 'module.exports.push(200);' >> log.js; exit $?
echo module.exports.push(100); >> log.js
scripts.postinstall:
:; echo 'module.exports.push(300);' >> log.js && echo 'module.exports = '"$(node -p 'Math.floor(Math.random() * 512000)')"';' > rnd.js; exit $?
:<<"::CMDLITERAL"
echo module.exports.push(300); >> log.js && echo module.exports = $(node -p 'Math.floor(Math.random() * 512000)'); > rnd.js
::CMDLITERAL
